name: EvanAI
short_description:
EvanAI he open-source alternative to Siri and similair AI's. This means you can communicate with Evan in English. EvanAI will be able to check your email, post Facebook and twitter updates, check the weather, convert currencies, and a lot more. It's written in Python, and uses a simple plugin-system to add functionality, and it's own XML-format to parse input. 
EvanAI is strongly inspired on Project Jarvis(projectjarvis.com)
summary: An open-source Siri alternative that's actually usefull
